Jimmy Fallon is dealing with 'midlife cr.content: "Jimmy Fallon will turn a year older in September, so there’s a long way to go but the TV host has already made a practice to wake up early and pack in the exercises.On bringing the light in first thing in the morning, Jimmy revealed, "I don't know if my wife enjoys it, but the whole room lights up.Describing what his morning routine these days is like, Jimmy Fallon said that he wakes up "at the crack of dawn."Jimmy Fallon marked 10 years as the host of the Tonight Show on February 17.Jimmy recently appeared on the chat show Today with Hoda & Jenna as he explained how he’s getting cracking about his 50th birthday.

Robert Pattinson's The Batman 2 delayed.content: Contrary to what movie buffs would think, Matt Reeves’ Batman is not a part of the James Gunn DC Universe.Matt Reeves’ The Batman 2 now has a new release date.The superhero flick will be James Gunn’s first collaboration with Peter Safran’s new DC Studios.The sequel to Matt Reeves’ The Batman was first announced at CinemaCon in April 2022.In late January 2023, DC Studios bosses James Gunn and Peter Safran gave the film a title and a release date.

Roman Polanski rape trial set for 2025:.content: While he is currently on trial for the same, the director will now face yet another sexual assault charge as another woman has come forward with her own set of sexual assault allegations – raping her when she was a minor in 1973.The new case will drag the Oscar-winning director to the US on August 4, 2025.Roman Polanski is notorious for giving American justice a miss and most people who have followed his life know that he will try to evade this trial too.He will face a trial for the rape charges next year in the United States.In her lawsuit which was first filed last May and amended in June, Jane Doe alleged that the director gave her tequila and then raped her at his Los Angeles home in 1973.

Kriti Kharbanda and Pulkit Samrat weddin.content: Also read: Karan Johar defends praising Animal, says ‘I saw it as a character film’The speculations around Pulkit Samrat and Kriti Kharbanda’s wedding surfaced after the duo on Valentine’s Days shared similar pictures of themselves from their romantic vacation.Also read: Salman Khan anounces new film with Sajid Nadiadwala, AR MurugadossOn Valentine’s Day, they teased pictures from a romantic vacation they undertook recently which hinted at the time of a March wedding.A source close to the couple told HT, “The wedding festivities have started with an intimate get-together of families in Delhi, and it will be followed by a festivities and wedding in Manesar.The wedding is rumoured to be scheduled for March 15 and there will be four days of festivities including pre-wedding functions like Haldi, Mehendi and other smaller functions.”Kriti was spotted today in Delhi ahead of the start of her wedding functions.

Ed Sheeran surprises schoolchildren with.content: As he arrived at the school ahead of his concert, Ed said in the video: “So, just arrived in Mumbai, India.Ed Sheeran is in India and he made a surprise visit to a school in Mumbai.Ed is in India to perform in Mumbai for the final leg of his ongoing tour on March 16.This will be Ed Sheeran’s second concert in India.In the caption, Ed wrote, “Visited a school in Mumbai this morning and swapped performances with the kids, so much fun.

'Sunset Boulevard' leads nominations at.content: A new production of "Sunset Boulevard" featuring Nicole Scherzinger as movie star Norma Desmond had 11 nominations, including in all the acting in a musical categories as well as for best musical revival.The contenders for best actress include "Succession" star Snook for "The Picture of Dorian Gray", Sophie Okonedo for "Medea", Laura Donnelly for "The Hills of California", Sheridan Smith for "Shirley Valentine" and Parker for "Plaza Suite", in which she stars opposite her husband, Matthew Broderick.Musical "Sunset Boulevard" and play "Dear England" led nominations for the Olivier Awards on Tuesday, with a spate of famous names from film and television including Sarah Jessica Parker, Joseph Fiennes and Sarah Snook also receiving nods at London's top theatre honours.Fiennes' co-star Gina McKee was also nominated for best actress in a supporting role.Soccer play "Dear England" got nine nominations, including a best actor nod for Fiennes for his portrayal of England manager Gareth Southgate.

Jimmy Kimmel defied Oscars producers who.content: ”  Kimmel responded on stage by jokingly thanking Trump for watching and quipping, “Blah, blah, blah … OK, now, see if you can guess which former president just posted that on Truth Social.He recounted, "They’re like, ‘You’ve got a little bit of time’ and I was like, ‘I’m reading the Trump tweet,’ and they’re like, ‘No, no, don’t read that.One of the highlights was Kimmel's decision to read out Donald Trump's scathing review of the show, posted on Truth Social.“Has there EVER been a WORSE HOST than Jimmy Kimmel at The Oscars,” Trump posted.”Regarding Al Pacino's awkward announcement of the best picture award to Oppenheimer, Kimmel joked, "I guess he’s never watched an awards show before.

Taylor Swift, Travis Kelce spotted at Ma.content: Guests at the party described Taylor and Travis as being in great spirits, with Taylor sporting a "very happy, giant smile" and Travis being protective of her.He was protective of her and she was delightful and glowing — they seemed very happy together and loving the night," a guest at the party told People.Taylor's appearance at the Oscars after-party followed her six-night Eras Tour run in Singapore, with Travis joining her for the fifth and sixth nights of the concert.Singer Taylor Swift and her boyfriend Travis Kelce made a glamorous appearance at Madonna's Oscars after-party in Los Angeles after returning from a trip to Singapore.During the fifth night, Taylor gave a nod to Travis by changing the lyrics of her song "Karma" to reference him.

Karan Johar defends praising Animal, say.content: I didn't go deep into the moral communication of the film - I was so swept by the narrative and the way the filmmaker told the story of it through sound design, screenplay, dialogue, character development, that as a filmmaker, I loved it," he added."She added, "I genuinely believe that a film is a filmmaker's self-expression, and that is very important.Filmmaker Karan Johar reiterated his admiration for Sandeep Reddy Vanga's film Animal at the Forbes India Leadership Awards 2024, calling it the best film of 2023.Prior to Johar's comments, actress Bhumi Pednekar also shared her views on Animal, expressing her preference for genres other than hyper-masculine films.Johar explained, "I saw it as a character film based on a character who was deeply dysfunctional, inherently violent, who had many emotional issues - and I loved the treatment.

Dev Patel gets standing ovation for dire.content: Dev Patel's directorial debut, Monkey Man, made its electrifying premiere at SXSW, leaving audiences in awe at Austin's Paramount Theatre.Despite the obstacles, Patel poured his heart and soul into Monkey Man, drawing inspiration from his childhood fascination with action movies and tales from his grandfather.Patel, who serves as director, producer, writer, and action star of Monkey Man, delivered a riveting performance as a young man seeking vengeance for his mother's death at the hands of a corrupt cop."This is a film that simply demands to be seen in a theatre with a huge rockstar audience," Peele remarked, emphasising the immersive experience Patel has crafted.The audience erupted in applause as Jordan Peele, present to introduce Patel, praised the actor's dedication to the project.

Diljit Dosanjh visits monastery in Kinna.content: Taking to Instagram and X, Diljit shared a video of his visit to a monastery, where he spent time with monks.Prior to his monastery visit, Diljit shared a fun video with his squad, showcasing their playful antics in the snow-capped mountains.The video captures the serene surroundings of the monastery and Diljit's interactions with the monks.During his time in Kinnaur, Diljit also immersed himself in the local culture, joining the locals in singing traditional songs.In the video, titled "Naina Da Kehna," Diljit and his friends can be seen enjoying the snowy landscape, adding a humorous twist to the song "Naina" from the film Crew.

Asha Bhosle's granddaughter Zanai to mak.content: "I am truly overjoyed to see my lovely granddaughter @ZanaiBhosle joining the cinema world in the upcoming grand epic #ThePrideofBharat Chatrapati Shivaji Maharaj.She wrote, "I am truly overjoyed to see my lovely granddaughter @ZanaiBhosle joining the cinema world in the upcoming grand epic #ThePrideofBharat Chatrapati Shivaji Maharaj.Zanai Bhosle, the granddaughter of legendary singer Asha Bhosle, is set to make her cinematic debut in the upcoming film The Pride of Bharat - Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj.I sincerely hope that she claims her destined position in cinematic history and wish her and @thisissandeeps all the… pic.I sincerely hope that she claims her destined position in cinematic history and wish her and @thisissandeeps all the very best.

Salman Khan anounces new film with Sajid.content: The actor is reportedly set to appear in director Vishnuvardhan's upcoming film The Bull, though an official announcement is yet to be made.It called the upcoming film one of its most ambitious projects to date and confirmed its release on Eid 2025.Salman Khan was last seen in the action thriller film Tiger 3 alongside Katrina Kaif and Emraan Hashmi.Sharing a photo featuring the trio, Salman revealed that the film is set to hit the screens on Eid 2025.Nadiadwala Grandson, the official Instagram page of Sajid Nadiadwala's production house, also shared the same photo and expressed excitement about the collaboration.

Great news! Sting announces ‘Sting 3.0’.content:
According to the announcement, the three will perform Sting’s biggest hits and are set to kick off the tour, presented by Cherrytree Music Company and Live Nation, at Detroit’s The Fillmore on September 17.Sting will perform alongside drummer Chris Maas, who previously served as tour drummer for Mumford & Sons, as well as longtime collaborator and guitarist Dominic Miller.Sting 2024 Tour Dates:
04/13 – San Diego, CA @ Petco Park *
09/17 – Detroit, MI @ Fillmore Detroit
09/18 – Detroit, MI @ Fillmore Detroit
09/20 – Toronto, ON @ Massey Hall
09/21 – Toronto, ON @ Massey Hall
09/27 – St.Also read: Kanye West's Carnival tops Billboard Hot 100 after a gap of 13 yearsTickets to the tour will be available from March 15.The tour will include multiple nights staging at various venues, including Brooklyn’s Brooklyn Paramount, Los Angeles’ The Wiltern and Philadelphia’s The Met.

James Patterson looks back through histo.content: The ultra-prolific author is launching a new middle-grade series, The Time Travel Twins, about a boy and girl who witness key moments in US history, starting with the era of the Revolutionary War.Like all of my children’s books, the goal of ‘The Time Travel Twins’ is for a kid to finish it and say, ‘Please, give me another book,’” Patterson said in a statement Monday.Released by Little, Brown Books for Young Readers, and co-written with Tad Safran, the series begins September 9.Patterson’s hundreds of books include children’s stories, his Maximum Ride and Alex Cross thrillers, political thrillers co-written with former President Bill Clinton and a novel written with Dolly Parton about the Nashville music scene.

Kanye West and Kim Kardashian's 10-year-.content: In a video now circulating on social media, North can be heard telling the crowd, “I’ve been working on an album, and it’s called Elementary School Dropout.At a recent listening party, North was spotted with her father Kanye West as she announced her upcoming debut album.Not only that, but I don't get why she would name the album what she did (1/3)Meanwhile, another user slammed North for nepotism, saying, “We don’t really care but it won’t flop because of nepotism.North West performing with Psalm and Chicago last night at the Vultures listening event in Chicago.”With all that being said i feel bad for North West.

Kanye West's Carnival tops Billboard Hot.content: Also read: BTS' V drops new music video for digital single ‘FRI(END)S’On the Billboard Hot 100, Teddy Swims’ “Lose Control” sits at No.Kanye West aka Ye started off the week on a high note as the rapper’s latest song “Carnival” topped Billboard Hot 100, after a long gap of 13 years.This feat makes Kanye West the only rapper to have got a No 1 in three separate decades.With “Carnival”, Ye has earned his fifth No 1 in this decade.2, followed by Harlow’s “Lovin On Me” at No.

Oscars 2024: Al Pacino defends his trunc.content: He said, “There seems to be some controversy about my not mentioning every film by name last night before announcing the best picture award.At the Oscars, Hollywood actor Al Pacino caused a controversy after he omitted names of Best Picture nominees while announcing the winner.”On how it was not his intention to omit the fellow nominees in the Best Picture category, Al said, “I realise being nominated is a huge milestone in one’s life, and to not be fully recognised is offensive and hurtful.Ten wonderfilm films were nominated, but only one will take the award for Best Picture.There were 10 films that made it to the Best Picture nomination list: Oppenheimer, American Fiction, Anatomy of a Fall, Barbie, The Holdovers, Killers of the Flower Moon, Maestro, Past Lives, Poor Things and The Zone of Interest.

Rust producers yet to pay settlement mon.content: It’s been a year since a US court directed the makers of the ill-fated film Rust to pay compensation to the family of Halyna Hitchins, the cinematographer killed when a gun held by actor Alec Baldwin accidentlly went off.Production for Rust resumed last April at a film ranch in Montana, several months behind schedule.Baldwin, who co-produced the film, and the other producers had announced a settlement after the Hitchins family filed a wrongful death lawsuit in October 2022.In addition to the ones accusing Baldwin, there have been several lawsuits and countersuits involving Gutierrez Reed, Hutchins’ relatives, crew members, the production company, insurance companies, and the Bonanza Creek Ranch, where the incident took place.It was decided in March 2023 that once Rust wrapped up, the producers will collectively make payments to the Hutchins estate, including insurance funds and a portion of the profits.
